contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Journal | title = Evolution | cover = [[image:Evolution cover.jpg]] | editor = Daphne Fairbairn | frequency = Monthly | discipline = [[Evolutionary Biology]] | history = 1946â€“present | website = [http://www.wiley.com/bw/journal.asp?ref=0014-3820 wiley] | country = | publisher = [[John Wiley & Sons|Wiley]] | impact = 5.146 | impact-year = 2011 | ISSN = 0014-3820 }} '''''Evolution''''', the '''''International Journal of Organic Evolution''''', is a monthly [[scientific journal]] that publishes significant new results of empirical or theoretical investigations concerning facts, processes, mechanics, or concepts of evolutionary phenomena and events. ''Evolution'' is published by the [[Society for the Study of Evolution]]. Its editor is Daphne Fairbairn. ==External links== *[http://evol.allenpress.com Official website] * {{JSTOR|issn=0014-3820}} [[Category:Evolutionary biology journals]] [[Category:Publications with year of establishment missing]] {{biology-journal-stub}}
